ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: i remember lvl  10 and 11 as a magician. I would say that CB is not the answer. I suggest you go to steamfont on the hill pass the windmill.  Kill drakes, (let
ygData.messageBody:
i remember lvl 10 and 11 as a magician. I would say that CB is not the answer. I suggest you go
to steamfont on the hill pass the windmill. Kill drakes, (let pet take
the heat, and use fireshield on the pet. give hime a +10 sv fire),
harpys,elementals, and watch out for HERO. I blew throught 10 and
11 in 3 days or about 10hr 1bar /hour.

goodluck.

Akdov D'Nidrah - High elf magician (lvl 19).
<So'jhin>
veeshan


> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> Crushbone is very dangerus area i dont know what lv do you have but as i
> spend there from my 6 to 11 lv i know it very vell moust important is to
> move from a entrance tunel it is a train magnet. You must find any place
> out of trains rutes. some places at slaver huts are safe. If you can say
> what lv are you i can give you precise indications where to go.
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> At 17.01 25/05/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: Ann Scanlan <scan@...>
> >
> >On Tue, 25 May 1999, Wizard wrote:
> >> >too bad; i died several time this weekend =(
> >>
> >> I like this one very very much !! So dear friends finaly verant guys
> >> found that death penality is too big in world where is so easy to die
> >> by thousnds of random things wich can provoke it and if you must to
> >> pass 3 zones to get your corpse i think that you will thing twice about
> >> daing a same mistake again.
> >
> >I died so many times this weekend- it was pathetic and frustrating and
> >had me seriously thinking about quitting the game altogether. I was
> >trying to solo in Crushbone and I only go out of the zone transition area
> >once. The trains would come in, my pet and I could handle all the green
> >orcs and then a slaver or taskmaster would show up and it was all over.
> >
> >Since the only things I'd been killing were green orcs, I was losing more
> >experience than I was making. It was completely disheartening and I
> >finally went back to the Chessboard in Butcherblock to make up the
> >experience I lost. I find the Chessboard sort of boring and it is not
> >very good for loot either. In short, by getting killed three times, I'd
> >lost all the experience I'd made in a week and was driven to go fight in
> >an area that didn't interest me.
> >
> >Which made the game not fun anymore. Luckily, I didn't make any rash
> >decisions. I'm level 10 and one of my goals in the game is to get to
> >level 20. Hopefully, this lowering of the death penalty will help me
> >accomplish this goal with the minimum amount of frustration and the
> >maximum amount of fun.
> >
> >Anya
> >High Elf Magician
> >Rallos Zek
> >
> >
> >
